sentences.en: 1859 -- Discovery of petroleum in western Pennsylvania.
sentences.cn: 1859年 —— 宾夕法尼亚西部发现石油.

sentences.en: Air photos are widely used in the search for petroleum.
sentences.cn: 航空象片广泛地应用在石油普查方面.

sentences.en: But it was actually the automobile that made petroleum so very useful.
sentences.cn: 实际上使石油变成那么有用的是汽车.

sentences.en: Coal and rock oil, or petroleum, are of great value as fuels.
sentences.cn: 煤和石油或汽油, 作为燃料,价值极大.

sentences.en: Crude oil can be refined into various petroleum products.
sentences.cn: 原油可炼制成各种石油产品.

sentences.en: Light petroleum distillate , generally known as naphtha, was the logical choice.
sentences.cn: 轻石油馏分, 如石脑油是合乎逻辑的选择.

sentences.en: Naturally occurring rock oil is referred to as crude oil or petroleum.
sentences.cn: 天然形成之石油,我们称作原油或石油.

sentences.en: Petroleum and natural gas are expressly excluded. )
sentences.cn: 石油和天然气被专门排除在外. )

sentences.en: Petroleum engineers plan and manage the extraction of oil.
sentences.cn: 石油工程师规划并管理石油的提炼。

sentences.en: Petroleum or oil photogeology is primarily an evaluation of bedrock conditions.
sentences.cn: 石油或石油摄影地质主要是研究基岩情况的.

sentences.en: Similar problems are encountered throughout the whole range of petroleum products.
sentences.cn: 在整个石油产品范围内都遇到类似的问题.

sentences.en: The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油.

sentences.en: They refined crude oil into various petroleum products.
sentences.cn: 他们将原油提炼成各种石油产品.

sentences.en: Two schools of thought regarding the origin of petroleum exist.
sentences.cn: 关于石油的成因有两大学派.

sentences.en: We ought to and can produce more petroleum.
sentences.cn: 我们应该并且能够生产更多的石油.

phrases.tran_cn: 石油产品；石油产物；石油制品
油贮；石油储集层；贮油柜

trans.tran_en: oil that is obtained from below the surface of the Earth and is used to make petrol,  paraffin  , and various chemical substances
